entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
